post.text: I am leaving Fitzgerald Peterbilt now, where I met with coal miners and leaders from the Virginia coal industry. I assure you - those out of work down here -- will be back to work under a Trump Administration! -DJT

comment.author: Daniel
comment.text: TRUMP you are simply the solution to the world predicament, am angry when you are referred as as an American president alone though it's Obama that degraded US, if Clinton continue in the step of Obama I bet you Naija will feed your country soonest and Isis will declare caliphate in Washington. No to crooked one yes to Trump

replies.author: Stacey
replies.text: Daniel, Inform all the African Americans and blog in places where they can hear you. Your voice will go along way.

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: Yes, we are doing just that in fact many Africa American here are going all the way on their own expense to do the fight of future.. Its clear Trump is the light Hillary is the darkness

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: I am bookmarking many of these pages and I'm going to come back and reference them 3 years from now when none of these "promises" have been fulfilled. Let's see how you feel then.

replies.author: Jadyn
replies.text: We tried that for 8 fkn years all ready time for a different direction .

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: Yeap it's true politicians are crazy but we have known Clinton to be careless, corrupted,insecure and full of lies so is better to pitch with Trump, if the race is btwn, Trump,Hillary and an Angel I will dump Trump but for now He is the right man for the Job
